titlepage.titleproper: Guide to the Fine Press Ephemera Collection, circa 1980 - 2000
titlepage.publisher:
Special Collections & Archives
Wesleyan University
Middletown, CT, USA

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult Special Collections & Archives staff.
did.abstract: This collection of printed ephemera and subject files about fine presses has been accumulated by Olin Library throughout the twentieth and twenty-first centuries.
The collection, which is arranged by press name or printer’s name, comprises ephemeral items produced by each press.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: Copyright for Official University records is held by Wesleyan University; all other copyright is retained by the authors of items in these papers, or their descendants, as stipulated by United States copyright law.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Fine Press Ephemera Collection, Collection #1000-73, Special Collections & Archives, Wesleyan University, Middletown, CT, USA.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed by Anne Thompson (Wesleyan class of 2002), Cristin Quealy (class of 2004), Martha Fleming-Ives (class of 2005), Melanie McCrea (class of 2006), and Jeffrey Makala in 2004

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: This collection of printed ephemera and subject files about fine presses has been accumulated by Olin Library throughout the twentieth and twenty-first centuries.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: The collection, which is arranged by press name or printer’s name, comprises ephemeral items produced by each press. The bulk are letterpress book prospectuses, but also include press catalogs and other advertising. Secondary material here refers to subject or clipping files taken from local and national publications about the press or printer, and are housed in a separate folder from the press ephemera itself.

controlaccess.head: Online Catalog Headings
controlaccess.p: These and related materials may be found under the following headings in online catalogs.
